"What is that over there?!": "That should be obvious. 'Tis a cocoon, of course. One that envelopes the fledgeling Profound."
"You... You're Elmir!"
"We've not met since Epic. I came to offer a formal greeting, comrade."
"Greeting...?"
"What are you talking about...?"
"Hahahahah! You wound me, comrade!"
"Oh well. I'll give you a nice big hint."
"Guess whoooo?"
"Hahahah, careful with that! This was once yours, wasn't it? Or rather, it belonged to the future you?"
"You're...!"
"Dark Falz...!"
"You've got it. I am Dark Falz [Persona]. He who has inherited that title."
"[Profound Darkness] assimilated with the Akashic Record."
"The darkness that leaked out from within found its way to me... To the unborn Elmir."
"Get it now? The Ephimera and I were both brought into this world together."
"But really, I was in quite the pickle. The Dark Falz Factors were all split up."
"Without them I could never become [Profound Darkness], I would just be a half-baked Dark Falz. Woe was me! Until you showed up."
"You really did pull through. Defeating all of them and returning their Factors to me."
"Returning them...?"
"Oho? Don't tell me you didn't notice."
"No matter how strong you think you are, there's no way you could handle the true power of a Dark Falz."
"I took the Factors for myself. All you got were the leftovers. Everyone got their share!"
"But taking the Factors... How is that even possible...!"
"My my, the grandchild of the Akashic Record sure isn't up to snuff."
"[Profound Darkness] latched on to the physical representation of the Akashic Record, no? Then the Factors' destination should be obvious."
"Bingo. This world itself is [Profound Darkness]. My humble birthplace."
"Though I must say, things sure have gone awry. Even I didn't intend for this outcome. Why should I have had to expose myself so?"
"I planned to wait, biding my time until the perfect moment, unbeknownst to anyone at all."
"But... But, you see. That Luther fellow does nothing but meddle, no matter the time or place."
"I don't know whether it was through summoning or otherwise, but he gained access to me and brought me into being."
"My meticulously crafted plan was all for naught."

"He even had the gall to steal my vessel.
I couldn't stay silent any longer."
"By having the humans enter into large-scale conflict, I would have the vessel and Factors returned to me."
"Ahh, that's right, the vessel. I owe you my thanks for that as well, comrade. You did a wonderful job of keeping it safe."
"Thanks to you, I can achieve rebirth under ideal conditions using the power I've amassed."
"...Your vessel?"
"What are you talking about?"
"Hmmm, now what was it called again...?"
"...Ah, that's right! Harriet was its name, no?"
"What have you done with Harriet?!"
"...It can't be."
"Inside of that cocoon..."
"Ding ding! Nice going, comrade! So you know what that means, then... Do you not?"
"I can only exist here. I am only needed here."
"That is why. I won't stop until everything is consumed."
"That's what being a Dark Falz means. Right, comrade?"
"Then I'll stop you here!"
"I won't let you get away with this!"
"Careful! Haste makes waste, they say. You're much too late anyway."
"Ta-ta, comrade. Your heroic tale of world destruction was quite fascinating."
"Hahaha, ahahah, hahahahahah!"
"...We have an emergency, you two. Sorry about this, but I'm calling you back."
